title: Collaborative Expense Splitter
description: A full-stack web app for group expense management with user auth, group creation, and a live group chat via WebSockets.

title: Python Stock Price Viewer
description: A desktop app using Python and Tkinter that fetches and displays real-time and historical stock price data from the Alpha Vantage API.

title: Full-Stack Online Bookstore
description: A dynamic e-commerce site with user registration, product browsing, and a functional shopping cart.
